message.body: Hi gabi I'm On my way do you know if theater is open?
I checked about 15 minutes ago and it wasnt, im at muddys
Hey I hadn't heard about Aristelle discount. How much? I'm a junkie
10% for anyone involved, 25% if we wear it in the show
I forgot to tell you tango music was perfect. Does it look really bad? We are both a little nervous. I want to have Tuesday 6-7 with band and Hugo if that's ok.
It looked great, there was just a spot or two where you look unsure and the rest was beautiful. Im pretty happywith the show, miraculously it does t seem too log
Yes we have some work to do but I'm feeling better. Finale and game seem a bit weird but it will come together. Ha!
